#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include<iomanip>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  
int T,N;
double X[25];
double Y[25];
double dubs=0;
cin>>T;
for(int kek=0; kek<T; kek++){ 
cin>>N;
dubs=0;
for(int i=0; i<N; i++){cin>>X[i];}
for(int i=0; i<N; i++){cin>>Y[i];}

for(int i=0; i<N-1; i++){dubs=dubs+(Y[i]+Y[i+1])*(X[i+1]-X[i])/2;}
dubs = dubs+ (Y[N-1]+Y[0])*(X[0]-X[N-1])/2;
cout << fixed << setprecision(1)<<dubs << '\n';
}
  return 0;
  }
